alert.note: Alert for Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 5:21PM EDT until August 25 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Bath, Menifee and Rowan. In southeast Kentucky, Morgan. * WHEN...Until 830 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Owingsville, Frenchburg, Young Springs, Ratlitt, Sudith, Yale, Scranton, Olympia Springs, Farmers, Cogswell, Zilpo, Freestone, Bluestone, Olympia, Big Woods, Bangor, Dan, Preston, Bourbon Furnace and Crooks. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
